#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;

        int sum = 0;

        for(int i=0 ;i<s.length(); i++)
            sum += int(s[i]);

        sum = sum / s.length();

        cout<<char(sum)<<endl;
    }
}
